value.title: The ROI of AI: Will it deliver real value?
value.excerpt: AI is not just a platform to be purchased and implemented. It is a fundamental shift in the way digital systems operate and are managed.

value.title: State University Seeks Software With AI, Machine Learning

value.title: Artificial Intelligence and Air-based sensors to help Indian Army scan LAC

value.title: Skepticism Abounds For Artificial Intelligence In High-Level Decisions
value.excerpt: Higher-level, more strategic decisions that shape the direction of a business represent the last great frontier for AI in enterprises. And, to date, there is no shortage of skepticism among decision makers when it comes to strategic AI.

value.title: Gartner survey of CIOs highlights investments in AI, cloud and cybersecurity

value.title: Machine learning can yield "proxy measures" for brain-related health issues
value.excerpt: A study published today by an interdisciplinary collaboration, directed by Denis Engemann from Inria, demonstrates that machine learning from large population cohorts can yield "proxy measures" for brain-related health issues without the need for a specialist's assessment.

value.title: How AI Is Transforming The Future Of Digital Marketing
value.excerpt: In business today, the term AI is used to describe software that is capable of learning and getting better at doing its job without input from humans. Current predictions state AI will end up creating more jobs than it destroys.

value.title: Waymo’s self-driving cars can’t get enough of one dead-end street
value.excerpt: Waymo's autonomous cars keep showing up in a dead-end street in a quiet part of San Francisco, causing residents there to wonder what on earth is going on.
